welcome_message_body: Welcome to charming Guararema, Brazil! Known for its quaint architecture, rich history, and lush nature, we invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay and soak up the beauty of Guararema.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sao Jose Dos Campos Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Sao Jose Dos Campos Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at Aeroporto Internacional Guarulhos, mainly used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The main terminal at Aeroporto Internacional Guarulhos, used for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Aeroporto Internacional Guarulhos, exclusively used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
